data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Guangyuan.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Guangyuan, Sichuan, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Guangyuan, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Guangyuan, Sichuan, China to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of Guangyuan.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, help every believer in Guangyuan, Sichuan, China be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 412,700 people living in Guangyuan.
Father, bring yourself glory in Guangyuan. Through your servants plant 82 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.
